mapper.delete: delete from t_blog where id between #{beginId,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and #{endId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
delete from t_blog where id like #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
delete from t_blog where id not like #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
delete from t_blog where id like CONCAT('%', #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
delete from t_blog where id like CONCAT( #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC},'%')
delete from t_blog where id like CONCAT('%', #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC},'%')
delete from t_blog where id = true
delete from t_blog where id = false
delete from t_blog where UPPER(id) = UPPER(#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
